feed.title: BIPS proposal for implementing AML-KYC in bitcoin

entry.title: BIPS proposal for implementing AML-KYC in bitcoin
entry.summary: In this context, Prabhat Kumar Singh is seeking suggestions from the Bitcoin developers on how to save the ecosystem of decentralized currency. He acknowledges that there may be other coins and protocols who are implementing something similar, but urges the Bitcoin community to take action in order to realize the dream of decentralized currency. The previous message emphasizes that individuals should not expect others to do the work for them, and encourages the coding up and submission of a pull request on Github.
